codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyBodySiteEye
codeSystems.title: Ophthalmic anatomical location
codeSystems.description: Describes the ophthalmic structure being referenced

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyConditionCodesValueSet
codeSystems.title: Ophthalmology Condition ICD10 and SNOMED codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Clinical findings for the eye region.

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyIOPMethods
codeSystems.title: Intraocular pressure (IOP) method valueset
codeSystems.description: Describes the various methods of capturing IOP that relate to the IOP Observation profile

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyObservableEntitiesValueSet
codeSystems.title: Ophthalmology observations (SNOMED)
codeSystems.description: Concept descends from 363926002 - Eye/vision observable (observable entity)

codeSystems.name: ObservationStatus
codeSystems.title: Observation Status
codeSystems.description: Describes whether a recorded observation is either final or amended

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyOCTMaculaObservableEntitiesValueSet
codeSystems.title: OCT Macula Observable Entities ValueSet
codeSystems.description: OCT Macula observations coding

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyOCTRNFLObservableEntitiesValueSet
codeSystems.title: OCT RNFL Observable Entities ValueSet
codeSystems.description: OCT RNFL observations coding

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyVisualAcuityObservableEntitiesValueSet
codeSystems.title: Visual acuity method valueset (SNOMED)
codeSystems.description: Describes the visual acuity observation result, where concept descends from 363983007 (Visual acuity)

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyVisualFieldObservableEntitiesValueSet
codeSystems.title: Visual Field Observable Entities ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Visual field observation coding

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyProceduresValueSet
codeSystems.title: Ophthalmology Procedures Valueset
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet represents procedure codes for clinical and billing purposes.

codeSystems.name: BodyStructureQualifiers
codeSystems.title: Ophthalmic anatomical location qualifiers
codeSystems.description: Describes whether a recorded observation is either final or amended

codeSystems.name: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
codeSystems.title: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet containing codes for various pupillomotor function observations.

codeSystems.name: PupilFunctionConfounders
codeSystems.title: Pupil Function Confounders
codeSystems.description: ValueSet including codes that represent confounders due to pupil function that may affect visual acuity measurements.

codeSystems.name: LensTypes
codeSystems.title: Lens Types
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet includes all SNOMED CT codes that are descendants of 'Contact lenses, device' (57368009) and 'Eye glasses, device' (50121007).

codeSystems.name: OphthalmologyVisualAcuityMethods
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Measurement Methods valueset
codeSystems.description: Describes the various charts that can be used to assess visual acuity where concept descends from 400912000 (Visual acuity test equipment (physical object))

codeSystems.name: OptotypePresentation
codeSystems.title: Optotype Presentation ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet that includes codes representing the type of optotype presentation used during visual acuity testing.

codeSystems.name: Optotypes
codeSystems.title: Optotype ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet that includes codes representing optotype used during visual acuity testing.

codeSystems.name: PinholeOccluderUsage
codeSystems.title: Pinhole Occluder Usage Values
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains SNOMED CT codes to represent whether a pinhole occluder was used during a visual acuity measurement.

codeSystems.name: PupiTestingActiveSubstances
codeSystems.title: Pupil Testing Active Substances
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to represent active substances used in pharmacological testing during pupil diameter measurements.

codeSystems.name: ValueSet-right-left-both-eyes
codeSystems.title: ValueSet-right-left-both-eyes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing laterality codes for ophthalmic observations which may contain information on one or both eyes

codeSystems.name: ValueSet-right-left-eyes
codeSystems.title: ValueSet-right-left-eyes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing laterality codes for ophthalmic observations which should only contain information on either the right or left eye, not both

codeSystems.name: RoomBrightnessLevels
codeSystems.title: Room Brightness Levels
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to represent the brightness of the room where a test was performed.

codeSystems.name: Special VA testing Parameters
codeSystems.title: Special VA testing Parameters
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to represent whether special testing parameters, such as a pinhole occluder or glare light, were used during a visual acuity measurement.

codeSystems.name: VisualAcuityCategoricalValues
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Categorical Values
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing categorical values for visual acuity observations.

codeSystems.name: VisualAcuityCorrectionMethods
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
codeSystems.description: Methods of correction used during a visual acuity test.

codeSystems.name: VisualAcuityCorrectionMethods
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
codeSystems.description: Methods of correction used during a visual acuity test.

codeSystems.name: VisualAcuityTestDistance
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Test Distance
codeSystems.description: Codes representing the distances at which visual acuity tests are performed.

codeSystems.name: VisualAcuityQuantityUnits
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Quantity Units
codeSystems.description: Units of Measure of Visual acuity
